Index.meta_description: A production-ready SaaS template with authentication, AI chat, and modern UI.

Hero.title: Build your next <important>SaaS product</important> faster.
Hero.description: A production-ready template with authentication, AI integration, and everything you need to launch quickly.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need to Build Fast
Features.section_description: VT SaaS Template provides a solid foundation for your next product.
Features.feature_description: Get started with a complete foundation.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Right Plan for You
Pricing.section_description: Get started with VT SaaS Template today.

FAQ.question: How does it work?
FAQ.answer: VT SaaS Template provides a complete foundation with authentication, AI chat integration, and modern UI components. Customize it to build your product quickly.

CTA.title: Ready to Get Started?
CTA.description: Start building your next product today.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You do not have the permissions to perform this action

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.
SignIn.title: Sign In
SignIn.subtitle: Welcome back to VT SaaS Template
SignIn.error_invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
SignIn.error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
SignIn.error_too_many_requests: Too many sign-in attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
SignIn.error_oauth_google: Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again.
SignIn.error_oauth_github: Failed to sign in with GitHub. Please try again.

AuthError.oauth_error_message: Something went wrong during sign-in. Please try again.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
SignUp.title: Create Account
SignUp.subtitle: Create your account to get started
SignUp.success_subtitle: We sent a verification email to
SignUp.success_message: Please click the link in the email to verify your account and get started.
SignUp.validation_password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
SignUp.validation_password_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
SignUp.validation_password_lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
SignUp.validation_password_number: Must contain at least one number
SignUp.error_oauth_google: Failed to sign up with Google. Please try again.
SignUp.error_oauth_github: Failed to sign up with GitHub. Please try again.

Chat.meta_description: Chat with your AI assistant for personalized guidance and support

ChatPage.title: Chat
ChatPage.description: Stay in one place while you switch between threads and get answers quickly.

Dashboard.meta_description: Your personal dashboard - access your account and chat with AI.

DashboardIndex.message_state_description: Start chatting with the AI assistant to get help with your questions.

UserProfile.title_bar_description: View and manage your user profile
UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Manage your account information and preferences
UserProfile.username_hint: 3-20 characters, letters, numbers, and underscores only
UserProfile.success_message: Your profile has been updated successfully
UserProfile.error_message: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
UserProfile.error_username_taken: This username is already taken. Please choose another.
UserProfile.validation_username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters
UserProfile.validation_username_max: Username must be at most 20 characters
UserProfile.validation_username_format: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
UserProfile.validation_display_name_max: Display name must be at most 50 characters
UserProfile.delete_account_description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
UserProfile.delete_dialog_message: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
UserProfile.delete_success_message: Your account has been permanently deleted
UserProfile.delete_error_message: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

VerifyEmail.meta_description: Verify your email address to complete your registration.
VerifyEmail.title: Check your email
VerifyEmail.subtitle: We sent a verification link to
VerifyEmail.message: Click the link in the email to verify your account. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
VerifyEmail.resend_error: Failed to send email. Please try again.
VerifyEmail.expired_message: This verification link has expired. Click below to receive a new one.
VerifyEmail.error_message: We couldn't verify your email. Please try again or contact support.
VerifyEmail.try_different_email: Sign up with a different address
VerifyEmail.success_message: Email verified! Welcome to VT SaaS Template

ForgotPassword.meta_description: Reset your password to regain access to your account.
ForgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
ForgotPassword.subtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
ForgotPassword.success_message: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
ForgotPassword.success_email_sent_to: Check your email! We've sent a reset link to
ForgotPassword.validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
ForgotPassword.error_rate_limit: Too many password reset requests. Please try again in a few minutes.
ForgotPassword.error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

ResetPassword.meta_description: Set a new password to regain access to your account.
ResetPassword.title: Set new password
ResetPassword.subtitle: Your new password must be different from previous passwords.
ResetPassword.requirement_hint: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
ResetPassword.success_message: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
ResetPassword.expired_message: This password reset link has expired for security reasons.
ResetPassword.invalid_message: This password reset link is invalid or has already been used.
ResetPassword.error_update_failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
ResetPassword.validation_password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
ResetPassword.validation_password_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
ResetPassword.validation_password_lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
ResetPassword.validation_password_number: Must contain at least one number

boundary.title: Something Went Wrong
boundary.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or return to the homepage.

auth.title: Dashboard Error
auth.message: Something went wrong with your dashboard. This could be a temporary issue.
auth.help_text: If the problem persists, try signing out and back in.

chat.title: Chat Error
chat.message: The chat interface encountered an error. Your conversation history is safe.
chat.help_text: Starting a new chat will clear the current conversation state.

component.card_message: Something went wrong while loading this section.
component.modal_message: An error occurred in this dialog.

AuthCodeError.meta_description: There was a problem verifying your email address.
AuthCodeError.title: Verification Failed
AuthCodeError.message: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
AuthCodeError.help_text: This can happen if you've already verified your email, or if the link has expired. Please try signing up again to receive a new verification email.

Onboarding.meta_description: Complete your profile to get started
Onboarding.step1Description: This will be your unique identity
Onboarding.usernameInvalid: 3-20 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, underscores only
Onboarding.errorSaving: Failed to save. Please try again.
Onboarding.errorNetwork: Network error. Please check your connection.
